013package org.apache.juneau.rest.vars;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
017import org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
019
020/**
021 * Servlet init parameter variable resolver.
022 *
023 * <p>
024 * The format for this var is <js>"$I{key[,defaultValue]}"</js>.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * This variable resolver requires that a {@link RestRequest} bean be available in the session bean store.
028 *
029 * <p>
030 * Values are pulled from the {@link RestServlet#getInitParameter(String)} method.
031 *
032 * <p>
033 * Since this is a {@link SimpleVar}, any variables contained in the result will be recursively resolved.
034 * Likewise, if the arguments contain any variables, those will be resolved before they are passed to this var.
035 *
036 * <ul class='seealso'>
037 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.SimpleVariableLanguage.jm.SvlVariables">SVL Variables</a>
038 * </ul>
039 */
040public class ServletInitParamVar extends DefaultingVar {
041
042   /** The name of this variable. */
043   public static final String NAME = "I";
044
045   /**
046    * Constructor.
047    */
048   public ServletInitParamVar() {
049      super(NAME);
050   }
051
052   @Override /* Var */
053   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String key) {
054      return session.getBean(RestRequest.class).orElseThrow(InternalServerError::new).getContext().getServletInitParameter(key);
055   }
056
057   @Override /* Var */
058   public boolean canResolve(VarResolverSession session) {
059      return session.getBean(RestRequest.class).isPresent();
060   }
061}
